ygData.subject: RE: Rumor of the bards ultimate weapon?
ygData.msgSnippet: Around 7pm central time - I poked my head into the Kith zone and was greeted by a zone fight with some reds with new names.  Most everyone was fleeing to the
ygData.messageBody:
Around 7pm central time - I poked my head into the Kith zone and was greeted
by a zone fight with some reds with new names. Most everyone was fleeing to
the zone and when it was just me and 2 mobs left I stepped back into safety
of west c.

Then med, healed who ever needed some and we popped back in - but it was now
"day time" such as it is in Kith. People did their CR and kinda explored
but nothing was found. I ran to RV for some banking and when I popped back
in for the next night fall (9pm spawn game-time rumor) but alas - nothing
happened. So I joined my reg group and headed for Lguk. Saw a system
message saying something about the event being over (although the reference
was to a different zone.)

So - that's all I know.

Sylly


-----Original Message-----
From: Benjamin Jerrad Segal
[mailto:birdman@...]
Sent: Tuesday, November 02, 1999 1:54 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Rumor of the bards ultimate
weapon?

From: Benjamin Jerrad Segal <birdman@...>

On Mon, 1 Nov 1999, Dark wrote:

> Bit confused but the high level undead spawn every night?
Does that mean
> they are still dropping good items?

That's what it sounded like. I spent tonight hugging the
zone in lower
guk and netted a bubble of 30 exp, will probably check
Kithicor tomorrow.
I haven't heard anything about really neat items being
dropped, I think
those were more from GM-controlled (and uncontrolled at some
point) more
than the undead spawns themselves.

Athren Notechaser, thanking Quellious for giving us Angst
